name: Planet Explorers
blurb: Be a stranded colonist and explore a detailed alien world in this smooth voxel based sandbox adventure RPG!

rewards.reward: No Reward
A big THANK YOU for helping us anyway you can and a wallpaper pack for your desktop.
Closed Alpha/Beta testing (starting Alpha 0.6) single player, and receive a digital copy of the final game when it comes out (can be a Steam key if we get on!),  plus wallpaper pack.
Closed Alpha/Beta testing (starting Alpha 0.6) both single and multiplayer, receive a digital copy of the final game when it comes out, and credited on game website, plus wallpaper pack.

Closed Alpha/Beta testing (starting Alpha 0.6) both single and multiplayer, receive a digital copy of the final game when it comes out, credited on game website, wallpaper pack, plus name located somewhere in the game world.
Everything from the previous tier, plus digital download of the game soundtrack.
Everything from the previous tier, plus digital version of the "Art of Planet Explorers" artbook, and name in game credits.
Everything from the previous tier, plus an exclusive iron armor set in game, a boxed DVD version of the game, and free access to all future downloadable content.

ALL DIGITAL PACK: Closed Alpha/Beta testing  (starting Alpha 0.6) both single and multiplayer, 2 digital copies of final game, wallpaper pack, credited on website, name located somewhere in the game world, digital download of the game soundtrack, digital version of the "Art of Planet Explorers" artbook, name in credits, an exclusive iron armor set in game, an exclusive iron weapon set in game, and all future downloadable content free.

ALL DIGITAL PACK 2: Closed Alpha/Beta testing (starting Alpha 0.6) both single and multiplayer, 3 digital copies of final game, wallpaper pack, credited on website, name located somewhere in the game world, digital download of the game soundtrack, digital version of the "Art of Planet Explorers" artbook, name in credits, an exclusive iron armor set in game, an exclusive iron weapon set in game, and all future downloadable content free.

One digital copy of the final game, a boxed game DVD, closed Alpha/Beta testing  (starting Alpha 0.6) both single and multiplayer, credited on website, wallpaper pack, name located somewhere in the game world, digital download of the game soundtrack, digital version of the "Art of Planet Explorers" artbook, name in game credits, an exclusive iron armor set in game, an exclusive iron weapon set in game, and all future downloadable content free, plus a limited edition game poster.

ALL DIGITAL PACK 3: Closed Alpha/Beta testing (starting Alpha 0.6) both single and multiplayer, 4 digital copies of final game, wallpaper pack, credited on website, name located somewhere in the game world, digital download of the game soundtrack, digital version of the "Art of Planet Explorers" artbook, name in credits, an exclusive iron armor set in game, an exclusive iron weapon set in game, and all future downloadable content free.

ALL DIGITAL PACK 4: Closed Alpha/Beta testing (starting Alpha 0.6) both single and multiplayer, 5 digital copies of final game, wallpaper pack, credited on website, name located somewhere in the game world, digital download of the game soundtrack, digital version of the "Art of Planet Explorers" artbook, name in credits, an exclusive iron armor set in game, an exclusive iron weapon set in game, and all future downloadable content free.

Same as the $75 tier (this tier is set here ONLY for avoiding possible misunderstanding of the "Everything from the previous tier" clause in the following tier after adding the $80 and $95 digital packs).
Everything from the previous tier, plus another digital copy of the game, and a game t-shirt.
Everything from the previous tier, plus one more digital copy of the game (total 3 digital copies) and a limited edition game figurine.
Everything from the previous tier, plus an exclusive steel armor set in game, an exclusive steel weapon set in game, and a limited edition physical copy "Art of Planet Explorers" artbook.
Everything from the previous tier, plus game t-shirt #2, limited edition game poster #2, and you name 2 random NPC characters. DVD and poster #1 will be signed by team.

Everything from the previous tier, plus an exclusive Captain's costume in game, an exclusive gold armor set in game, an exclusive gold weapon set in game, another digital copy of the game (total 4 digital copies), and a Captain's cap (real cap!). Even more, the artbook will be signed by team.

Everything from the previous tier, plus a Republic of Earth steel travel mug (real one!), another figurine for your friend, one more digital copy of game (total 5!) and an exclusive in game vehicle. Also, poster #2 will be signed by team.

Everything from the previous tier, plus design a blade weapon for the game, get an exclusive platinum armor set in game, an exclusive in game boat, exclusive in game shades, and a Planet Explorers travel bag (real bag!) for your trip to Maria!

Everything from the previous tier, plus you name and design a NPC character (can be in your likeness!), get an exclusive in game hovercraft, an exclusive in game moonstone armor set, and an exclusive in game platinum weapon set.

Everything from the previous tier, plus we'll paint your likeness in the game's style and in a game setting, and make it a special game poster for you, together with a beautiful laser engraved Republic of Earth crystal (real crystal about the size of 5x4x2.5")!

Everything from the previous tier, plus you'll design a reasonable (must fit the game world) side quest that will be made into the final game. The development team will work closely with you (limited to 1 business week of 1 programmer, 1 artist, and 1 animator's time, prep time doesn't count). You'll also be listed as an honorary designer in game credits.

Everything from the previous tier, plus you'll  collaborate with the Pathea team to design a reasonable (must fit the game world) game feature into the final game.  Limited to 1 business week of 1 programmer, 1 artist, 1 animator, and 1 concept artist's time, prep time doesn't count. It can be combined with the side quest design of the previous tier. Of course, your name will be honored at the start of the game credits.
